title: KMartha? Martha Stewart wishes she bought Kmart
text:
KMartha? Martha Stewart wishes she bought Kmart Martha Stewart regrets not buying the retail chain that used to be packed with her products. Post to Facebook KMartha? Martha Stewart wishes she bought Kmart Martha Stewart regrets not buying the retail chain that used to be packed with her products. Martha Stewart regrets not buying the retail chain that used to be packed with her products. 
"We thought about buying [Kmart], but we didn't do it, and we should have," The Bedford resident said in an interview with The Associated Press. "That could have been our store -- KMartha...We'd have a fantastic chain of stores right now." 
Kmart sold the Martha Stewart brand -- from towels to furniture -- until their partnership ended in 2009. The Martha Stewart Living mogul recently agreed to sell her lifestyle company to Sequential Brands Group, whose brands include Ellen Tracy and Linens â€˜n Things, in a stock-and-cash deal worth $353 million. 
Photo: Getty
